example.eg: I met someone today who said he knew you.
example.egtrans: 我前两天碰到一个人说他认识你。

example.eg: She's meeting her friends at the cinema.
example.egtrans: 她与朋友要在电影院外碰面。

example.eg: Will you come and meet me at the bus stop?
example.egtrans: 你能来公交车站跟我见面吗？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 与…碰面, 与…见面，跟…见面, 和…打个招呼

example.eg: The whole family will meet our flight at the airport.
example.egtrans: 全家都会来机场接我们。

example.eg: I'd like you to meet my friend James.
example.egtrans: 我想让你认识一下我的朋友詹姆士。

example.eg: My partner and I met at the wedding of a mutual friend.
example.egtrans: 我和我的爱人是在一个朋友的婚礼上相识的。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 认识, 结识, 相识

example.eg: Where would you like us to meet?
example.egtrans: 你希望我们于何处相会？

example.eg: There will be a motorcycle meet at the park on Saturday.
My track team has a meet this weekend.
example.egtrans: 我们田径队这周末有场比赛。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 比赛, 竞争, 角逐

example.eg: The speeding cars met in a loud crash.
The union will meet on Tuesday.
example.egtrans: 工会将于周二进行集会。

example.eg: There is a stop sign where the roads meet.
example.egtrans: 道路交汇的地方有禁止行车的标志。

example.eg: Many men died when the two armies met.
The traveller meets a strange sight as he enters the city.
There is a blockage at the point where the pipe meets the main line.
example.egtrans: 管道与主干相连接的位置发生了堵塞。

example.eg: Dartmouth will meet Princeton for the championship.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 正面遭遇, 与…正面交手, 和…对峙, 与...角逐

example.eg: The allied forces met their enemy on the fields of northern France.
I'll meet that problem later. For now, I have to do this job.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 对付, 处理, 应付

example.eg: The employee's performance did not meet his manager's expectations.  The project team are struggling to meet their objectives due to a lack of effort on the part of some members.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 满足, 达到, 达成

example.eg: This process does not meet quality standards.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 满足, 符合, 达到

example.eg: I wish I could see my friends more often, but it's hard to find a time when we can all meet up.
example.egtrans: 我希望能经常见我的朋友，但是很难找到一个我们都有空的时候聚会。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 偶然碰到, 见面，聚会

example.eg: I'll meet up with you again tonight.
The president's speech to Congress met with mixed reactions; one party cheered, the other booed.
He met with an accident on his way to the court.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 和…会面, 遭受, 遭遇

example.eg: We were forced to sack Pete because his work did not meet with our standards.

dsense.name: make ends meet
dsense.guideword: figurative (have enough money to live on)

example.eg: In the current economic crisis, a lot of families are finding it hard to make ends meet. I can't make ends meet with what you pay me.
example.egtrans: 在目前经济危机下，许多家庭都发现很难做到收支平衡。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 收支平衡，量入为出，收支相抵, （钱）足够生活
赶上最后期限，如期完工

example.eg: Email and conference calls can't replace meeting face to face.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 面对面会谈, 当面会谈, 面谈

example.eg: While I was out hiking, I met face to face with a mountain lion.
The goods were sent back to the manufacturer because they did not meet quality requirements.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 达到要求, 合格, 达标

example.eg: Our team of advisors will meet with you to discuss your career goals.
Penelope's suggestion met with approval.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 受到支持, 获得支持

dsense.name: meet with [sb]'s approval, meet with the approval of [sb]

example.eg: The plans met with the approval of the local business community.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 受到...的支持, 获得...的支持

example.eg: He met with success early at his new job.

dsense.name: meet your maker, go to meet your maker

example.eg: Although the apartment wasn't plush, it met my needs.

dsense.name: nice to meet you, glad to meet you

example.eg: Nice to meet you! Your brother has told me so much about you.
Pleased to meet you, Mr Green; I trust you had a good journey?

trans_examp.trans_cn: 旧物交换会, 易物会

example.eg: My daughter won first place at the high school track meet in the 50 yard dash.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 田径运动会, 田径比赛, 径赛

dsense.name: until we meet again, Until we meet again!

example.eg: Please take care of my sister until we meet again.
